>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/tfaappnewapp"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Unlinks the current two-factor authentication application from the user account specified in the request.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>

>
  
</RequestSchema>
